tool.name: Compounds/Adducts identification
tool.description: Identifies compounds/adducts based on m/z and retention time.

param.name: anno
param.label: Annotation File
param.help: Input dataset 1 in wide format and tab separated. If not tab separated see TIP below.

param.name: uniqID
param.label: Unique Feature ID for Annotation file
param.help: Name of the column on you annotation file containing unique ID.

param.name: mzID
param.label: Mass/Charge for annotation file.
param.help: Name of the column on you annotation file containing m/z.

param.name: rtID
param.label: Retention Time for annotation file
param.help: Name of the column on you annotation file containing Retention Time.

param.name: library
param.label: Compound/Adduct Library
param.help: Library that is going to be used on the compound/adduct identification process.

tool.help:
@TIP_AND_WARNING@
**Tool Description**
This tools identifies compounds or adducts for a given annotation file based on different libraries.
The possible libraries to choose from are: - Negative Metabolite - Negative Tryptophan - Positive Metabolite - Positive Tryptophan
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
**Input**
- Two input datasets are required.
@MZRTFILE@
**Unique Feature ID for Annotation file**
- Name of the column on you annotation file containing unique ID.
**Mass/Charge for Annotation file**
- Name of the column on you annotation file containing m/z.
**Retention Time for Annotation file**
- Name of the column on you annotation file containing Retention Time.
**Library**
- Library that is going to be used on the compound/adduct identification process.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
